Cockpit
=======

API
---
For an overview of the call interfaces and their valid call parameters 
refer to 

   .. raw:: html
      
      <style>
         div.apisynopsislarge blockquote {
            font-size: 1.5ch;
         }
      </style>
      
      <div class="apisynopsislarge">
      <div class="apisynopsis">

   .. parsed-literal::
   
      :ref:`The namedtupledefs API <namedtupledefsAPI>`

   .. raw:: html
   
      </div>
      </div>

**Call interfaces**:

   .. raw:: html
   
      <div class="indextab">
      <div class="nonbreakheadtab">
      <div class="autocoltab">

   +-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | Component                                                         | HowTo                             | API                                                     | Sources                                                                |
   +===================================================================+===================================+=========================================================+========================================================================+
   | :ref:`namedtupledefs.__init__ <API_namedtupledefs_init>`          | :ref:`HowTo Named Tuples <HOWTO>` | `namedtupledefs.__init__ <namedtupledefs_init.html#>`_  | `namedtupledefs.__init__ <_modules/namedtupledefs/__init__.html#>`_    |
   +-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   | :ref:`namedtuple_original <API_namedtupleoriginal>` [namedtuple]_ |                                   | :ref:`namedtupledefs.__init__ <API_namedtupleoriginal>` | :ref:`namedtupledefs.namedtuple_original <NAMEDTUPLE_ORIGINAL_SOURCE>` |
   +-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+

   .. raw:: html
   
      </div>
      </div>
      </div>

For implementation details refer to
"`The SW-Design of namedtupledefs <sw_design.html#>`_".
